snippet.title: Pikmin 2 Multiplayer 2.0 (Pikhacks week Day 4)
snippet.description:
After being in development hell for over 18 months, the long awaited update to the Multiplayer mod is finally released!
New full-screen mode allows you to play with people like normal, but with no split-screen needed!
Many improvements are here, such as the new HUD, fixed sound effects, character select, name tags, and more.
If you have questions about how to use Full-screen mode, make sure you check the README, it has a code you need to use in dolphin's netplay.
To clarify though, by default splitscreen mode requires no codes and works on console or dolphin. Both modes are updated, although I mostly only had full-screen footage for this video.

Download this and all my other projects from here:
https://pikhacker.github.io/

Join my discord if you havent in order to play with others or get help using this: https://discord.gg/WHSaSS5
